titleStmt.title: A Discourse of the repugnancy of sin to the principles of universal reason being a dissuasive from a sinful life from principles of common wisdom currant amongst all mankind, save onely in the concerns of their souls.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Edward Millington ... and William Abington ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
